titles.title: Children's Head Start Intervention for Life and Development Act
A bill to amend the Head Start Act by establishing grants for Head Start programs in communities affected by toxic pollutants, and for other purposes.
Children's Head Start Intervention for Life and Development Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Children's Head Start Intervention for Life and Development Act
This bill amends the Head Start Act to establish five-year, nonrenewable grants for eligible entities to carry out Head Start programs in communities affected by the pollution of water by lead or a toxic pollutant in an event declared by the President to be an emergency.
In awarding these grants, the Department of Education shall give priority to eligible entities in partnerships with child care providers that are providing child care services at the time of the enactment of this bill.
